document_data.caption: A map showing Al-Malih River flowing past Halwa.
document_data.name: Al-Malih River
document_data.mainbody: '''Al-Malih River''', also called the '''Dry River''', was located in [[Zakhara]] near [[Halwa]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Geography: This river originated northeast of Halwa somewhere in the [[Great Anvil]] and flowed past the city for hundreds of miles toward the southwest.
document_data.Activities: Al-Malih River was a major feature along the [[Dihl al-Taif]] trade route since it offered a fresh source of water to caravans parched from hundreds of miles of desert travel.
